Version 2.1
Phrasebook is the result of what has started as part of a research experiment within a University course held at Technical University of Denmark (DTU), and has been further developed to become stable and user-friendly.
In this version, it's now possible to create multiple Phrasebooks, each one independent from the other; very useful to people who'd like to improve several languages.
The User Interface has been redesigned to comply with the latest Android Material Design guidelines.
Furthermore, a lot of different bugs have been fixed, which makes the app now more stable and improves the general navigation flow.
Please address any questions or inquiries to the developers and feel free and very welcome to contact them, since the app is still under development and they would feel really excited to know feedback from the users. .
